PmogSessionManager

This class handles the authentication, the storing and retrieving of local login credentials and session handling of Pmog players.

This class supports login credential storage for both Firefox two and three.

Summary
PmogSessionManager
This class handles the authentication, the storing and retrieving of local login credentials and session handling of Pmog players.
Functions
PmogSessionManager
Initializes the Object
find_login_credintials
This function determines which manager to use to retrieve the stored passwords.
find_all_logins
This function returns a list of all logins saved by pmog
use_login_manager
This function is used by at least Firefox three, and will find all usernames and passwords for the pmog domain.
use_password_manager
This function is used by Firefox two, and will find all usernames and passwords for the pmog domain.
login
The login function makes the remote login attempt on the Pmog server.
save_login
This function tries to save the player’s credentials within Firefox.
login_as
Display a prompt screen for the user to enter their PMOG credientials.
delete_login
Delete the stored credientials for a particular user.
delete_all_logins
This function will delete all logins and passwords stored for the pmog domain.

Functions

PmogSessionManager

PmogSessionManager = function(session_url)

Initializes the Object

find_login_credintials

PmogSessionManager.prototype.find_login_credintials = function(user)

This function determines which manager to use to retrieve the stored passwords.

Parameters

userString containing the login of the user whose credentials we want to find.  If user is null it will try to use the current_user preference if available.

Returns

Hash containing the username and password or a list of other logins

find_all_logins

PmogSessionManager.prototype.find_all_logins = function()

This function returns a list of all logins saved by pmog

Returns: Hash containing list of all logins that have logged into pmog at least once.

use_login_manager

PmogSessionManager.prototype.use_login_manager = function(user)

This function is used by at least Firefox three, and will find all usernames and passwords for the pmog domain.

Parameters

userstring of the last user to login or nil.

use_password_manager

PmogSessionManager.prototype.use_password_manager = function(user)

This function is used by Firefox two, and will find all usernames and passwords for the pmog domain.

Parameters

userstring of the last user to login or nil

login

PmogSessionManager.prototype.login = function(user,
pass,
callback,
remember_me)

The login function makes the remote login attempt on the Pmog server.

Parameters

userString designating the username
passString designating the password
callbackFunction to invoke when the Pmog server returns a result
remember_meBoolean value that if true means the user wants to store their username and password within Firefox to allow Pmog to log them in automatically in the future.

save_login

PmogSessionManager.prototype.save_login = function(domain,
user,
pass)

This function tries to save the player’s credentials within Firefox.

Parameters

domainThe domain to associate the username and password with.
userString designating the username
passString designating the password

login_as

PmogSessionManager.prototype.login_as = function(callback,
ignore_stored_credentials)

Display a prompt screen for the user to enter their PMOG credientials.

Parameters

callbackA function to invoke when the prompt screen is closed.
ignore_stored_credentialsif false the function will force the player to use the prompt window to enter their username and password.

delete_login

PmogSessionManager.prototype.delete_login = function(login,
confirm)

Delete the stored credientials for a particular user.

Parameters

loginthe name of the user to delete
confirmBoolean which determines whether or not to show a confirmation screen.

Returns

Boolean true if successful or false if not.

delete_all_logins

PmogSessionManager.prototype.delete_all_logins = function()

This function will delete all logins and passwords stored for the pmog domain.

Returns

Boolean true if successful and false if not.
